definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: The merchant’s heart sank and turned cold.
sentences.chinese: 商人的心倏地下沉，漸漸變冷。

sentences.english: A large black car skidded to a halt by the dustbins.
sentences.chinese: 一輛黑色大轎車在垃圾箱旁倏地一聲停住了。

sentences.english: Wenddy turned as a flash and hit her attacker as hard as she could.
sentences.chinese: 溫迪倏地一轉身，盡力狠揍其攻擊者。

sentences.english: And April slips into our arms.
sentences.chinese: 於是四月便倏地一下飛進我們懷中。

sentences.english: He the Shu ground turn round den once, he takes camera to clap to go to and appreciate in cluster.
sentences.chinese: 他倏地轉身回書房，他去拿相機拍向去羣裏欣賞。

sentences.english: When I go, Danny, I want to go out quickly-like a light.
sentences.chinese: 我要死的話，丹妮，要死得迅速，象燈火倏地熄滅。

sentences.english: A some cold Yin female sound Shu grounds ring out.
sentences.chinese: 一個有些陰冷的女音倏地響起。

sentences.english: He made a quick drop, slanting down on his backswept wings, and then circled again.
sentences.chinese: 它倏地斜着後掠的雙翅俯衝，然後又盤旋起來。

definition: in a flash/in the twinkling of an eye
wide and open/a flash of understanding
